statements: SELECT * FROM extraterrestrial_life_forms;
SELECT name, type FROM extraterrestrial_life_forms WHERE type = 'Alien';
SELECT * FROM extraterrestrial_life_forms WHERE color = 'Green';
SELECT id, name, type FROM extraterrestrial_life_forms ORDER BY type DESC;
SELECT * FROM extraterrestrial_life_forms WHERE origin = 'Alpha Centauri' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, color FROM extraterrestrial_life_forms WHERE type = 'Alien';
SELECT * FROM extraterrestrial_life_forms ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, origin FROM extraterrestrial_life_forms WHERE color = 'Green' OR color = 'Blue';
SELECT id, name, type FROM extraterrestrial_life_forms WHERE origin = 'Mars' AND color = 'Red';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM extraterrestrial_life_forms;
SELECT * FROM Extraterrestrial_Life_Forms WHERE age > 100 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, planet FROM Extraterrestrial_Life_Forms WHERE id = 3
SELECT * FROM Extraterrestrial_Life_Forms WHERE planet = 'Mars'
SELECT id, name, age FROM Extraterrestrial_Life_Forms WHERE age IS NOT NULL ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT encounter_id, location, date FROM Alien_Encounters WHERE aliens_seen >= 5 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM Extraterrestrial_Life_Forms WHERE age > 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT planet, COUNT(*) FROM Extraterrestrial_Life_Forms GROUP BY planet HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT AVG(age) AS average_age, planet FROM Extraterrestrial_Life_Forms GROUP BY planet ORDER BY average_age DESC;
SELECT name, age, planet FROM Extraterrestrial_Life_Forms WHERE name LIKE 'A%' OR planet = 'Mars' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT E.name, A.location FROM Extraterrestrial_Life_Forms E INNER JOIN Alien_Encounters A ON E.planet = A.location WHERE A.date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM extraterrestrial_life_forms;
SELECT name, species FROM extraterrestrial_life_forms WHERE origin_planet = 'Mars';
SELECT * FROM alien_encounters ORDER BY encounter_date DESC;
SELECT description FROM alien_encounters WHERE location = 'Area 51';
SELECT name, specialty FROM research_scientists WHERE location = 'NASA';
SELECT * FROM extraterrestrial_life_forms WHERE origin_planet = 'Mars';
SELECT id, name, species FROM extraterrestrial_life_forms WHERE discovered_on > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY discovered_on DESC;
SELECT r.name, r.specialty, ae.location FROM research_scientists r INNER JOIN alien_encounters ae ON r.scientist_id = ae.alien_id WHERE ae.encounter_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT name, species FROM extraterrestrial_life_forms WHERE origin_planet IN ('Mars', 'Venus') ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM alien_encounters ae WHERE ae.description LIKE '%abducted%' ORDER BY ae.encounter_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Extraterrestrial_Life_Forms;
SELECT name, planet FROM Extraterrestrial_Life_Forms WHERE planet = 'Mars';
SELECT id, alien_species, date FROM Alien_Encounters ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT description FROM Alien_Abductions WHERE date > '2022-01-01' AND date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT location, witness_name, date FROM UFO_Sightings WHERE witness_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM UFO_Sightings WHERE date > '2020-01-01'
SELECT id, alien_species FROM Alien_Encounters WHERE location = 'Area 51'
SELECT name, planet FROM Extraterrestrial_Life_Forms WHERE planet = 'Mars' ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM Alien_Abductions WHERE date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2020-12-31' LIMIT 5
SELECT description, witness_name FROM UFO_Sightings WHERE witness_name IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM research_centers;
SELECT center_name, location FROM research_centers WHERE location='Earth';
SELECT * FROM alien_sightings ORDER BY sighting_date DESC;
SELECT species_id, species_name, habitat FROM alien_species WHERE classification='Friendly';
SELECT researcher_name, field_of_study FROM researchers WHERE field_of_study='Astrophysics' ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM research_centers;
SELECT center_name, location FROM research_centers ORDER BY center_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE field_of_study = 'Astrobiology';
SELECT rs.researcher_name, a.species_name FROM researchers rs INNER JOIN alien_sightings s ON rs.researcher_id = s.researcher_id INNER JOIN alien_species a ON s.species_id = a.species_id;
SELECT rp.publication_title, r.researcher_name FROM research_publications rp INNER JOIN researchers r ON rp.researcher_id = r.researcher_id WHERE rp.publication_date > '2020-01-01';
